price: और उसमें वे ऐसे जाम पिलाए जाएँगे, जिसमें सोंठ मिली होगी।
arabic: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: wayus'qawna fīhā kasan kāna mizājuhā zanjabīlan
translations: And they will be given to drink
